-- getWbsCdList SELECT MST.WBS_CD AS wbsCd , ISNULL(dbo.fn_getUpperDeptNm(MST.DEPT_CODE), MST.DEPT_NAME) AS deptName , ISNULL(dbo.fn_getSabunName(MST.sa_sabun_new), MST.SA_SABUN_NAME) as saSabunName , MST.TSS_NM AS tssNm , MST.TSS_STRT_DD AS tssStrtDd , MST.TSS_FNH_DD AS tssFnhDd FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST MST WHERE 1=1 AND MST.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND MST.WBS_CD NOT IN ( SELECT X.WBS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PGS_STEP_CD IN ('DC', 'CM') )
AND MST.WBS_CD LIKE '%'+#{wbsCd}+'%'
AND MST.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'+#{prjNm}+'%'
AND MST.SA_SABUN_NEW IN ( SELECT SA_SABUN_NEW FROM dbo.IRIS_SSO_USER EMP WHERE EMP.SA_NAME LIKE '%'+#{saName}+'%' )
AND MST.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'+#{uperdeptName}+'%'
AND MST.TSS_STRT_DD >= #{fromDate}
AND MST.TSS_FNH_DD <= #{toDate}
ORDER BY TSS_STRT_DD DESC
